name: VWTestDrivewithAlexa
0:
”Alexa open test drive”
”Alexa ask test drive reset to pre drive status”
”Alexa, ask test drive tell me about the pano roof.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: test drive
des: The Alexa-Enabled Test Drive skill enables customers to test drive a vehicle like they normally would with a salesperson in the passenger seat. However instead of a salesperson providing answers to customer questions, an Alexa device in the vehicle will respond to the driver with those same details without the need for a salesperson riding along during the drive.
